commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.body: This hides legitimate style warnings, annoyingly.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: Lint/Strip/Ensure: fix ensure on save selector.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: json: use Ruby JSON module if no jsonlint.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: linter: fix `which` behaviour with no results.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: markdown: move hedge_words to separate file.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: Change attribute and environment naming again.
commits.body: This is required for TextMate inclusion.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: Use scopes instead of environment variables.
commits.body:
This is an experiment to let this be integrated into TextMate as an
installable plugin.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.body:
Don’t assume a set environment variable is always truthy (as it could
be set to e.g. false). Also, refactor these checks into a separate
method.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: linter: don’t treat HTML ERB as Ruby.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.body: This is used to pass `--auto-correct` to RuboCop.

commits.author: Mike McQuaid
commits.summary: markdown: don’t match words inside other words.
